Summary: Arrowhead shaped craft with incredible speed flew over my head.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was just a kid in Greenville North Carolina at the time. There are two thing I remember vividly about this sighting. This thing moved FAST and it was LOUD. It was so fast I didn't even hear it until it was over my head. It came at me from behind and I saw it just as I looked up to see where this amazingly loud roar came from. It all happened in an instant. It seemed to be only a couple hundred feet in the air. In an instant this thing was a little black slit on the horizon.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Greenville
There were no other sightings in Greenville on or around August 15th 1989
